MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD9 postcode area of Newcastleton. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 10PM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area, We have had reports of a tree on the overhead line network and because of conditions on site we now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6AM. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1AM on 18 November 2020.
